name: Warehouse Juju
description:
MOVE WITH WASD, INTERACT WITH LEFT CLICK.

In Warehouse Juju, you're a magic wholesale shop apprentice in charge of sales and organizing the shop's warehouse. The boxes that you sell contain very powerful magic and don't want to stay in place though, so try to keep up with the chaos and not get fired on your first day! 


Programming by Lauratchi
Music by fingerspit
Art + Design by Ivan Papiol
Font: Bad Ink

This game started as a GMTKjam game that we didn't finish on time (；￣Д￣), but we thought that it would be cute to get it released anyway!
